abstract: Chess column notes that current top player Magnus Carlsen has gotten into a strange habit of falling behind in tournaments before storming back to win, as he did in the Bilbao Chess Masters against Vassily Ivanchuk.
snippet: Magnus Carlsen has gotten into a strange habit of falling behind in tournaments before storming back to win.
lead_paragraph: Magnus Carlsen has gotten into a strange habit of falling behind in tournaments before storming back to win.

headline.main: The No. 1 Player, and Master of the Late Rally
headline.seo: Chess: Magnus Carlsen Is Master of the Late Rally
headline.print_headline: The No. 1 Player, and Master of the Late Rally
